ch0111_90_wataru/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been waiting for you! What path are you
taking today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0111_90_wataru/0101_0701_02_10: I look forward to seeing where you’ll go!
ch0111_90_wataru/7101_0701_01_10:
Dragon Pokémon are spoken of in legends and
known for being hard to raise.
ch0111_90_wataru/7101_0701_02_10:
But if you can establish a connection with them
and raise them well, their powers are superior!
ch0111_90_wataru/7101_0701_03_10: That’s what I did with my Dragonite!
ch0111_90_wataru/7102_0701_01_10:
My clan has a deep connection with
dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_90_wataru/7102_0701_02_10:
But I’m probably the only one who’s has a
connection with a deified Pokémon.
ch0111_90_wataru/7103_0701_01_10:
Arceus is a sacred and legendary being who is
said to have shaped all there is in this world.
ch0111_90_wataru/7103_0701_02_10:
Dragon Pokémon are considered to be sacred and
legendary creatures, too.
ch0111_90_wataru/7103_0701_03_10:
In other words, the combination of their powers
are superior!
ch0111_90_wataru/7104_0701_01_10:
Our experiences on Pasio have had a positive
influence on Dragonite!
ch0111_90_wataru/7104_0701_02_10:
And of course, our interactions with you have
contributed to that, too!
ch0111_90_wataru/7104_0701_03_10: I look forward to spending more time with you!
ch0111_90_wataru/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m sure you’ll also acquire great power one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0111_90_wataru/7105_0701_02_10: But don’t forget to remain kind.
ch0111_90_wataru/7105_0701_03_10:
It’s not unheard of for people who gain great
power to become corrupted by it.
ch0111_90_wataru/7105_0701_04_10: Not that I think that would happen to you, though.
ch0111_90_wataru/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! Here, take this!
ch0111_90_wataru/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you put it to good use!
ch0111_90_wataru/2501_0701_01_10: My favorite part about this outfit is the cape.
ch0111_90_wataru/2501_0701_02_10:
Capes are an essential, iconic component of any
dragon master’s attire.
ch0111_90_wataru/2501_0701_03_10:
This sacred shine... I can feel a surge of power
coming from my body!
ch0111_90_wataru/2501_0702_02_10:
After a while, it’ll revert back to my original
clothes.
ch0111_90_wataru/2501_0702_03_10:
The fact that it’s temporary adds to its appeal
though, don’t you think?
ch0111_90_wataru/2511_0701_01_10:
I don’t mean to brag, but I’m impressed
that Dragonite and I were able to awaken
a new power...
ch0111_90_wataru/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m genuinely happy that the love I have for my
partner Pokémon manifested in a visible way.
ch0111_90_wataru/2511_0702_01_10:
As long as you have a strong and upstanding
nature, your Pokémon will respond to it.
ch0111_90_wataru/2511_0702_02_10:
Never forget to feel compassion for and trust in
your Pokémon, and to have perseverance and
determination!
ch0111_90_wataru/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Still feeling sleepy? The best way
to shake that off is to get your body moving!
ch0111_90_wataru/3003_0701_01_10:
Shall we go for a lap around Pasio?
Come on—it’ll take no time with my Dragonite!
ch0111_90_wataru/3005_0701_01_10:
There are many Trainers around the world. As
Champion, I must continue to set a good example
for them.
